sentence: Esta es una muestra de los apoyos de Trump hasta ahora en 2022: Respald a Herschel Walker en la carrera por el Senado de Georgia.
title: ANLISIS | La palabra que explica el respaldo de Donald Trump a J.D. Vance

sentence: On May 24, Georgia voters are likely to make formal a fall matchup between Sen. Raphael Warnock (D) and former NFL running back Herschel Walker (R).
author: Reid Wilson
title: Busy month of primaries to set stage for midterms

sentence: Some Republicans worry that Trump's picks, like former football star Herschel Walker in Georgia, could prove too controversial to prevail against Democrats in November, imperiling the party's bid for Senate control.
author: Eric Cox and Nathan Layne
title: Trump-backed Candidate Wins Republican Nomination For Ohio U.S. Senate Seat
